instruction: Create a data model for a driver on a car-sharing platform
output:
A Driver data model should include the following attributes:
- Name 
- Email 
- Phone number 
- Driver’s license details 
- Driving history 
- Current vehicle/s in possession 
- Payment information 
- Driver ratings/reviews 
- Safety/in-car camera footage (optional) 
- Number of rides completed 
- List of passengers carried 
- Average rating of passengers carried 
- Geolocation data 
- Other demographic or relevant data (e.g. gender, age, profession, etc.)
